options.description: show this help message and exit
options.name: --help

options.description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`.
options.name: --color

options.description: Path to alternate config file
options.name: --config

options.description: Run on all the files in the repo.
options.name: --all-files

options.description: Specific filenames to run hooks on.
options.name: --files

options.description: When hooks fail, run `git diff` directly afterward.
options.name: --show-diff-on-failure

options.description: The stage during which the hook is fired. One of commit-msg, post-checkout, post-commit, post-merge, post-rewrite, pre-commit, pre-merge-commit, pre-push, pre-rebase, prepare-commit-msg, manual
options.name: --hook-stage

options.description: Remote branch ref used by `git push`.
options.name: --remote-branch

options.description: Local branch ref used by `git push`.
options.name: --local-branch

options.description: (for usage with `--to-ref`) -- this option represents the original ref in a `from_ref...to_ref` diff expression. For `pre-push` hooks, this represents the branch you are pushing to. For `post-checkout` hooks, this represents the branch that was previously checked out.
options.name: --from-ref

options.description: (for usage with `--from-ref`) -- this option represents the destination ref in a `from_ref...to_ref` diff expression. For `pre-push` hooks, this represents the branch being pushed. For `post-checkout` hooks, this represents the branch that is now checked out.
options.name: --to-ref

options.description: The upstream from which the series was forked.
options.name: --pre-rebase-upstream

options.description: The branch being rebased, and is not set when rebasing the current branch.
options.name: --pre-rebase-branch

options.description: Filename to check when running during `commit-msg`
options.name: --commit-msg-filename

options.description: Source of the commit message (typically the second argument to .git/hooks/prepare-commit-msg)
options.name: --prepare-commit-message-source

options.description: Commit object name (typically the third argument to .git/hooks/prepare-commit-msg)
options.name: --commit-object-name

options.description: Remote name used by `git push`.
options.name: --remote-name

options.description: Remote url used by `git push`.
options.name: --remote-url

options.description: Indicates whether the checkout was a branch checkout (changing branches, flag=1) or a file checkout (retrieving a file from the index, flag=0).
options.name: --checkout-type

options.description: During a post-merge hook, indicates whether the merge was a squash merge
options.name: --is-squash-merge

options.description: During a post-rewrite hook, specifies the command that invoked the rewrite
options.name: --rewrite-command

usage: pre-commit run [-h] [--color {auto,always,never}] [-c CONFIG] [--verbose] [--all-files | --files [FILES ...]] [--show-diff-on-failure] [--hook-stage {commit-msg,post-checkout,post-commit,post-merge,post-rewrite,pre-commit,pre-merge-commit,pre-push,pre-rebase,prepare-commit-msg,manual}] [--remote-branch REMOTE_BRANCH] [--local-branch LOCAL_BRANCH] [--from-ref FROM_REF] [--to-ref TO_REF] [--pre-rebase-upstream PRE_REBASE_UPSTREAM] [--pre-rebase-branch PRE_REBASE_BRANCH] [--commit-msg-filename COMMIT_MSG_FILENAME] [--prepare-commit-message-source PREPARE_COMMIT_MESSAGE_SOURCE] [--commit-object-name COMMIT_OBJECT_NAME] [--remote-name REMOTE_NAME] [--remote-url REMOTE_URL] [--checkout-type CHECKOUT_TYPE] [--is-squash-merge IS_SQUASH_MERGE] [--rewrite-command REWRITE_COMMAND] [hook]
